title: Logan flight disruptions expected to persist after government reopens

title: Horse dies, multiple others rescued by firefighters in Attleboro barn fire
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News The barn is considered a total loss.
Attleboro Fire Department Attleboro firefighters rescued multiple animals from a barn fire on Wednesday.
However, one horse died in the blaze.
